To an earlier question of yours: I'm not in charge. I merely run the site and everything, but the council makes decisions jointly.

You can vote by going to nbwrpg.com, logging in with your username and password, and scrolling down and clicking on the election polls. The rest should be self-explanatory from then on.

> If it isn't over yet how do I vote? Next time how do I run?
>
